---
title: "Penguin Dashboards"
format: dashboard
---

```{r, echo=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(plotly)
library(janitor)

penguins <- read_csv("data/penguins_lter.csv")

penguins <- penguins %>%
  clean_names()
```

## Row 1

```{r, warning=FALSE}
ggplot(penguins, aes(island, culmen_length_mm )) +
  geom_boxplot()
  
```

```{r}
ggplot(penguins, aes(flipper_length_mm, body_mass_g, color = species)) +
  geom_point()
```

## Row 2

```{r}
penguins <- penguins %>%
  select(-c(comments, delta_15_n_o_oo, delta_13_c_o_oo))

knitr::kable(penguins) 
```
